comments:
I simply cannot get Eclipse to run on my AMD64 box, no matter what I try.  I am running under JDK1.6.0, 64-bit version of course, and I have also tried the blackdown 1.4.2 64-bit edition.  Furthermore, I tried version 3.1.1 of Eclipse.  The error I get under most configurations is the following.  After a while, they seem to accumulate until a dialog box pops up informing me that Eclipse has completely run out of memory and must shut down.  In eclipse.ini, I added the flags -Xms512m and -Xmx1024m, and I have 2GB of physical RAM.  Any hints would be greatly appreciated, this has been blocking me for months.  Thanks!
